titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the King at White-Hall The 24th. of Novemb. 1678. By William Lloyd, D.D. Dean of Bangor, and Chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty. Published by his Majesties Command.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M.C. for Henry Brome, at the Gun at the West-End of St. Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at White-Hall.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
